subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes the configuration properties of the PivotGridFieldChooser UI component.

subMembers.name: allowSearch
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the field chooser allows search operations in the *"All Fields"* section.

subMembers.name: applyChangesMode
subMembers.description: Specifies when to apply changes made in the UI component to the PivotGrid.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.description: The data source of a [PivotGrid] UI component.

subMembers.name: encodeHtml
subMembers.description: Specifies whether HTML tags are displayed as plain text or applied to the values of the [header filter].

subMembers.name: allowSearch
subMembers.description: Specifies whether searching is enabled in the header filter.

subMembers.name: allowSelectAll
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a "Select All" option is available to users.

subMembers.name: headerFilter
subMembers.description: Configures the header filter feature.

subMembers.name: height
subMembers.description: Specifies the height of the popup menu containing filtering values.

subMembers.name: search
subMembers.description: Configures the header filter's search functionality.

subMembers.name: searchTimeout
subMembers.description: Specifies a delay in milliseconds between when a user finishes typing in the header filter's search panel, and when the search is executed.

subMembers.name: showRelevantValues
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to show all field values or only those that satisfy the other applied filters.

subMembers.name: cancel
subMembers.description: Specifies the text of the button that closes the popup menu without applying a filter.

subMembers.name: emptyValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the item that represents empty values in the popup menu.

subMembers.name: ok
subMembers.description: Specifies the text of the button that applies a filter.

subMembers.name: texts
subMembers.description: Configures the texts of the popup menu's elements.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of the popup menu containing filtering values.

subMembers.name: height
subMembers.description: Specifies the UI component's height.

subMembers.name: layout
subMembers.description: Specifies the field chooser layout.

subMembers.name: searchTimeout
subMembers.description: Specifies a delay in milliseconds between when a user finishes typing in the field chooser's search panel, and when the search is executed.

subMembers.name: state
subMembers.description: The UI component's state.

subMembers.name: allFields
subMembers.description: The string to display instead of **All Fields**.

subMembers.name: columnFields
subMembers.description: The string to display instead of **Column Fields**.

subMembers.name: dataFields
subMembers.description: The string to display instead of **Data Fields**.

subMembers.name: filterFields
subMembers.description: The string to display instead of **Filter Fields**.

subMembers.name: rowFields
subMembers.description: The string to display instead of **Row Fields**.

subMembers.name: texts
subMembers.description: Strings that can be changed or localized in the PivotGridFieldChooser UI component.

properties.name: dxPivotGridFieldChooser
properties.description: A complementary UI component for the [PivotGrid] that allows you to manage data displayed in the PivotGrid. The field chooser is already integrated in the PivotGrid and can be invoked using the context menu. If you need to continuously display the field chooser near the PivotGrid UI component, use the PivotGridFieldChooser UI component.

Methods.name: applyChanges()
Methods.description: Applies changes made in the UI component to the PivotGrid. Takes effect only if [applyChangesMode] is *"onDemand"*.

Methods.name: cancelChanges()
Methods.description: Cancels changes made in the UI component without applying them to the PivotGrid. Takes effect only if [applyChangesMode] is *"onDemand"*.

Methods.name: updateDimensions()
Methods.description: Updates the UI component to the size of its content.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onContextMenuPreparing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the context menu is rendered.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: contextMenuPreparing
